column3: ~The first three commits are from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15632. Please review that PR first.~\n\nBase PR has been merged. This is ready for review.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

Commit log and PR description updated.\n\nThis will require rebase since https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15632 has been updated. I don't intend to do that until #15632 is merged to avoid multiple iterations of rebase/review.
This comment is replaced by the `Don't relay conflicted or already confirmed transactions` comment above the call to `GetDepthInMainChain()`.
Nit: Extra `;` at end of line :-)
Thanks @practicalswift. That commit is from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15632, where I've now removed the extraneous `;`. Do you mind reviewing that PR?
